name: Little by Little
description:
Little by Little : 

Help strange little monsters by crafting the items they need.

If you get stuck, consider taking a look at the collection to get a hint !

Made in 4 days for the Wowie Jam 4.0

Hints :

- The flower can give you string

- The fire craft is a bit hard, you might need a bow to get it

- You can find fish and bird by hunting with the right weapon in the right place

- You might need gold coin to trade with other humains

Credits :

Visuals : Blackthornprod Epic Icon Pack & 100 Fantasy Characters Mega Pack

Sound : Celtic, Medieval, Tavern Music Pack
